data.name: Hidden Cats in London
data.detailed_description:
Meow meow meow dear friends! Kitties are hidden in London, let's find them all. A short and pleasant experience in a big and pleasant illustration! Start with a Beautiful monochromatic scenario, relax and find all the cats one by one to reveal the final colored art. Play through different modes and find special cats too!

GAME MODES


Starter
Find 100 cats in fixed positions.
Use hints to help you find cats.

Advanced
Find 200 cats in random positions.
Find special cats.
Use hints to help you find cats.

Accessibility

  • Dark Mode
  • Color Blindness Mode
  • Invert Mouse Zoom
  • Mouse Drag Sensibility
  • Edge Screen Scrolling
  • Full Controller Support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 550 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS High Sierra
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
